tool_description: A text extraction, manipulation, and analysis api. Putting the power of natural language processing (nlp) in every developers hands.
name: TextAPI
title: TextAPI

api_list.name: Display Entities
api_list.description: Renders the extracted entity types on submitted text or spans defined manually.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.default: An October post from Dylan that may be saving you a Google search.

api_list.name: Extract Entities

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.default: U.S. stocks rallied Thursday, with the Dow Jones Industrial Average up 2.9% in a tempestuous first half of the year.

api_list.name: Sentiment
api_list.description: Get the sentiment of submitted text using VADER (Valence Aware Dictionary and sEntiment Reasoner) is a lexicon and rule-based sentiment analysis tool that is specifically attuned to sentiments expressed in social media.

api_list.name: Extract Text [From Webpage]
api_list.description: Extract text from the webpage linked with the url query parameter.
